name: higlass
description: HiGlass Hi-C / genomic / large data viewer
author: Peter Kerpedjiev <pkerpedjiev@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/scripts; mkdir -p dist/styles; cp -r app/images dist/; NODE_ENV=development ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js; cp build/hglib.js dist/scripts; cp app/index.html dist/; cp app/hglib.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/styles/hglib.css; cp doc/favicon.ico dist/; cp app/styles/page.css dist/styles/;
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/scripts; mkdir -p dist/styles; cp -r app/images dist/; NODE_ENV=watch ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js; cp build/hglib.js dist/scripts; cp app/index.html dist/; cp app/hglib.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/styles/hglib.css; cp doc/favicon.ico dist/; cp app/styles/page.css dist/styles/;
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/scripts; mkdir -p dist/styles; cp -r app/images dist/; NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --display-optimization-bailout; cp build/hglib.js dist/scripts; cp app/index.html dist/; cp app/hglib.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/styles/hglib.css; cp doc/favicon.ico dist/; cp app/styles/page.css dist/styles/; zip -r dist.zip dist
scripts.compile-debug: rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/scripts; mkdir -p dist/styles; cp -r app/images dist/; ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js; cp build/hglib.js dist/scripts; cp app/index.html dist/; cp app/hglib.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/styles/hglib.css; cp doc/favicon.ico dist/; cp app/styles/page.css dist/styles/; zip -r dist.zip dist
scripts.test-watch: NODE_ENV=development; npm run build && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.js
